EmailTemplate.subject: Your EMS CAM Connection Newsletter - December 2011
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
December 2011 Edition (http://offers.tritech.com/EMS_CC_Dec11_Main.html) Welcome to the December issue of your Client Account Manager (CAM) Connection from the EMS Solution's division of TriTech Sofware Systems.
Important Alerts & Updates (http://offers.tritech.com/EMS_CC_Dec11_AlertUpdates.html)
> TriTech Software Systems Strengthens Customer Support with Center of Excellence
> HIPAA 5010 Could Interrupt EMS Service Revenue Stream
> TriTech Welcomes Tyler Harman to EMS Sales Team
> TriTech Offers Value to EMS Industry Through Sponsorships and Affiliation Program
> Ohio Ending EMSIRS – Update to Sweet Billing Run Sheet?

> TriTech’s VisiCAD Helps Decrease Response Times to 31 Seconds in South Metro Denver
> Fusion ePCR Version 6.2 Coming Soon
> Sweet Billing Version 5.8 Offers New System Dashboard
> Benefits of EMS Software Delivered Over the Internet
> Group Training for Sweet Billing Users Offered in Rockford, Illinois
> Complimentary Webinar Recordings
> December Coffee with Kelly Topics
